alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Grant; Owen; Pendleton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 8:15PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF GRANT, CENTRAL OWEN, PENDLETON AND CENTRAL GALLATIN COUNTIES THROUGH 845 PM EST... At 815 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was located near Owenton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Williamstown, Falmouth, Dry Ridge, Owenton, Butler, Morgan, Glencoe, Corinth, Sparta, Browning Corner, Stewartsville, Elk Lake, Northcutt, Camp Northward, Sherman, Goforth, Greenwood, Cherry Grove, Long Ridge and Williamstown Lake. This includes I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 145 and 163. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
